ACME ATELIER is the home of bespoke kiltmaker Andrea Chappell, who combines the traditional crafts of kiltmaking and printmaking to create bespoke kilts in both contemporary and traditional designs, using modern and vintage fabrics, historic tartans and classic tweeds. 

These uniquely personal kilts are cherished as modern family heirlooms, many are commissioned to celebrate special life events, designed to last more than one lifetime and each kilt is entirely handmade in Scotland. 

Every kilt is bespoke, taking approximately 8-12 weeks to complete and priced individually, depending on your choice of design and cloth. 

Please contact me via the email below if you would like to discuss a commission for yourself, or gift for a loved one.
